name: Timeless Tale
description:
An adventure platformer where you have to cross obstacles and time, to reach the end!

There is falling damage, and also the magic circles, make you restart the level

Also the browser version has an issue, the Main menu it's completly black, but you can press the buttons, you have an image on the comment section, where you can see the Start button, after that, the games work fine on browser!

Hope you gonna enjoy it!
